verbose_text: To check the role of the RISC component AGO2 on miR-346 activity, we co-transfected HeLa cells with or without miR-346 mimic along with either negative control siRNA, Dicer, or AGO2 siRNA, and measured APP levels of cell lysates 72 h post transfection by western blot followed by densitometry and normalization to alpha-tubulin levels.
